page.title: The Year Dolly Parton Was My Mom

{{Infobox film | name = The Year Dolly Parton Was My Mom | image = | caption = | director = [[Tara Johns]] | producer = [[Barbara Shrier]] | screenplay = Tara Johns | story = | starring = [[Macha Grenon]]
[[Gil Bellows]]
[[Julia Stone]] | music = | cinematography = | editing = | studio = | distributor = | released = {{Film date|2011|3|4|Canada}} | runtime = | country = {{Film Canada}} | language = English | budget = | gross = }} '''''The Year Dolly Parton Was My Mom''''' is a 2011 Canadian coming-of-age movie written and directed by Tara Johns. [[Dolly Parton]] provides a voice cameo. ==References== '''Reviews''' *[http://www.vancouverobserver.com/culture/film/2011/04/12/year-dolly-parton-was-my-mom "The Year Dolly Parton Was My Mom: What would you do if one of the greatest singers was your mother?] by Dan McPeake. The Vancouver Observer. April 12th, 2011 *[http://www.theglobeandmail.com/news/arts/movies/the-year-dolly-parton-was-my-mom-a-film-that-needs-more-cleavage/article1946136/ "The Year Dolly Parton was My Mom: A film that needs more cleavage"] by Liam Lacey. Globe and Mail. 18 March 2011 *[http://www.thestar.com/entertainment/movies/article/955168--the-year-dolly-parton-was-my-mom-country-charm "The Year Dolly Parton Was My Mom: Country charm"] by Bruce DeMara. Toronto Star. 17 March 2011 *[http://www.vancouversun.com/entertainment/movie-guide/Debut+small/4580244/story.html "Debut is a small gem: First-time director creates humble but satisfying film"] by Katherine Monk. Vancouver Sun. 8 April 2011 '''Interview with director''' *[http://www.vancouversun.com/entertainment/movie-guide/Dolly+director+never+gave+idea/4580245/story.html "Dolly director never gave up on her idea"] by Katherine Monk. Vancouver Sun. 8 April 2011 ==External links== '''Official site''' *[http://theyeardollypartonwasmymom.ca The Year Dolly Parton was My Mom: official site] {{DEFAULTSORT:Year Dolly Parton Was My Mom, The}} [[Category:2011 films]] [[Category:Coming-of-age films]]
